Masoja Josiah Msiza (a mụrụ n'October 5, 1964) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, na-ede uri na onye na-eti egwu. A maara ya nke ọma maka igosipụta "Nkunzi Mhlongo" na telenovela Uzalo nke nwetara ihe nrite.
A mụrụ Msiza na Kwa-Thema, obodo dị na mpaghara Gauteng nke South Africa
Ịhụnanya ya maka ime ihe nkiri malitere mgbe ọ dị afọ 9 ma nwee mmasị isonye na nkuzi nka na ihe nkiri

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, o sonyere na asọmpi ihe nkiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ya nke ọ meriri. Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ chọtara ọrụ dịka onye na-egwupụta ihe n'ime ala ma mesịa chụọ ya na ndị ọzọ na-egwe ihe n'okpuru ala na-etinye aka n'ọgbaghara. Mgbe a chụpụrụ ya, o kpebiri ịchụso nrọ ya ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma gosipụta ọrụ izizi ya n'egwuregwu a na-akpọ "Mfowethu" nke Gibson Kente duziri.
Msiza malitere ọrụ ya dịka onye na-ede uri ma mesịa bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn, onye na-eti egwu na onye na-akọ akụkọ

Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ama ama dịka Kalushi: The Story of Solomon Mahlangu na A Million Colours Otú ọ dị, ọrụ ya kachasị pụta ìhè bụ ngosipụta ya nke onye omekome obi ọjọọ Nkunzebomvu "Nkunzi" Mhlongo na ihe ngosi telivishọn a na-elekarị na South Africa Uzalo. Ọ pụtakwara n'ọtụtụ usoro TV dịka Scandal!, Shreads and Dreams, Rhythm City, Intersexions, Sokhulu & Partners, na Making Cents with the Sitholes.
N'afọ 2016, ọ nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya na telivishọn na telenovela a na-akpọ "Ring of Lies".
N'afọ 2004, o dere uri maka South African National Football Team n'oge asọmpi AFCON nke emere na Tunisia
O dekwara ma mee uri mgbasa ozi maka ụlọ ọrụ redio kachasị ukwuu na South Africa Ukhozi FM.
Na June 22, 2019, Masoja Msiza ya na Dudu Khoza gosipụtara Cothoza Music Awards nke mbụ kwa afọ nke otu A cappella Ladysmith Black Mambazo na-enweta ọtụtụ onyinye kwadoro.
Msiza bụ nna ụmụ atọ, otu nwa nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ.
